name: Visibility Zero
description:
You've are an astronaut, stuck on a distant planet.

You need to find the Simple Field Emitter parts to fix Communication Device and call for extraction.

The good news: the planet is a junkyard, 99% chance to locate needed parts.

The bad news: zero visibility. Almost absolute darkness.

Pitch black. The only option is to use OneScreen 9000 device.

You have one screen with 3 modes:

1. I-RED – shows heated objects;
2. MGNI – traces the landscape for topology reconstruction (error chance ~12%);
3. SPEC – spectral analysis & scan for valuable resources.

Various modes toggles various visibility. You need to use them all to reach mission objectives. Good luck!

Controls:

WASD+Mouse – walk & look
Shift – run
Space – jump
1 – I-RED mode
2 – MGNI mode
3 – SPEC mode
Q – lower screen
RMB – zoom view
F - Toggle Fullscreen
